track.description: Please see the venue website for more information about different tracks: https://dex-manipulation.github.io/rss2024/

supplementary_material.description: All supplementary material must be self-contained and zipped into a single file. Supplementary material is **optional For the paper submission track**. For the demo submission track, you should upload a summary document as a `pdf` under the PDF field and upload your video demo as a `zip` file in this supplementary field. Supplementary material is **mandatory for the demo submission track**. The maximum file size is 100MB.
